title: Maharani Kundan & Emerald Haaram - A Royal Statement
materials: 22K Gold base with intricate Kundan setting
embellished with meticulously selected Emeralds (Panna) of exceptional green hue and clarity. Features delicate freshwater pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a cascading design. The kundan work is intricately detailed, creating a floral lace-like effect, while the emeralds add a touch of regal elegance. The pendant is a statement piece, featuring a pear-shaped emerald surrounded by smaller kundan designs and suspended pearls. Classic design for a regal look
colors: with the shimmering white of Kundan and the soft luster of freshwater pearls. Traditional South Indian color palette associated with prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivahaalu)
and other significant cultural celebrations. Also makes a bold statement at upscale events and parties.
description: A true heirloom piece, this Haaram embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry. The combination of Kundan and Emeralds signifies opulence and good fortune. Meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and lasting beauty. The classic design makes it a timeless investment.
